Articles.Content:
I am posting these here because I am not sure what to do with them. Beginning in December, shortly after the update to .90, I experienced a series of crashes. I am happy to say that I have not had any crashes in a couple of days. Since December, I have uninstalled all mods and reinstalled them one at a time, discarding any mod that was not compatible with .90. I also updated the texture compression mod (as of today) and have had no further crashes since the 21st of January (fingers still crossed ).

The only reason I am sharing these is offer any help or insight into what they might indicate... If you need any additional information, please let me know.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/7dfulgjkrpzlzaq/AACQEIwoE_PUS3vzedfVpDkHa?dl=0

Edited February 7, 2015 by adsii1970
